SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractShape
The AbstractShape class provides a partial implementation of the Shape interface, including a reference point and the compareTo method for comparing shapes based on their areas.
Circle
The Circle class represents a geometric circle.
PerimeterComparator
The PerimeterComparator class compares shapes based on their perimeters.
Point2D
The Point2D class represents a point in a two-dimensional coordinate system.
Rectangle
The Rectangle class represents a geometric rectangle.
Shape
The Shape interface represents a geometric shape that can calculate its area and perimeter.
ShapeDemo
The ShapeDemo class demonstrates sorting shapes based on area and perimeter.
ShapeTest
The ShapeTest class contains unit tests for the Rectangle, Circle, and Triangle classes.
Triangle
The Triangle class represents a geometric triangle specified by three points.
